Afficher/masquer le mot de passe en clai: Show password as plain text. Note: this will visually expose your password on the screen
Accéder à l'espace de création de formul: Go to the form creation area
Accéder à l'espace de création de menu: Go to the menu creation area
Accéder à l'espace de création de tablea: Go to the table creation area
Vous pouvez retrouver nos tutoriels sur: You can find our tutorials on the page
Accéder à la page des mentions légales: Go to the legal notice page
Accéder à la page des CGU: Go to the terms of use
pour que l'accessibilité soit enfin une: so that accessibility is finally a priority
Laissez nous vous aider à rendre votre s: Let us help you make your website more accessible
Pour certaines personnes, l’accès aux re: For some people, accessing web resources is difficult and painful. Making sites accessible is important so that everyone, regardless of their condition, has equal access to knowledge and skills. Easy to C can help you in this process.
Comment Easy to C peut m’aider ?: How can Easy to C help me ?
Comment fonctionnent les outils Easy to: How do Easy to C tools work?
Nous vous proposons trois outils pour vo: We offer three tools to make your life easier
Un menu simple et design. Il permettra à: A simple and designer menu. It will allow your users to navigate peacefully on your website. It only takes a few clicks to remove the complexity of the code and bring up the menu you need.
Facile à analyser, code optimisé et acce: Easy to analyze, optimized and accessible code. Its functionalities allow the creation of infinite rows and columns as well as the composition of boxes to merge and many other functions.
Afin de recevoir des réponses favorables: In order to receive favorable responses on your forms, you must ask yourself the following question: can everyone answer them? EasyToC allows you to manipulate all types of form fields to create the one you need.
Voici ce que nous pouvons faire pour vou: Here's what we can do for you and your users
Un site web accessible reflète un code o: An accessible website reflects an optimized code, that is to say something clean. And even if your users do not see it, your browser spends more time on your pages and thus promotes your natural referencing. This allows you to be seen better and by everyone.
Interagir avec une page internet peut pa: Interacting with a web page can sometimes be restrictive. A code error can annoy your users, who are unhappy or simply unseat leaving the site. EasyToC guides you, so as not to make mistakes and thus think about the comfort of your users.
Négliger l’accessibilité d’un site web p: Neglecting the accessibility of a website can lead to the loss of many prospects. This is why EasyToC allows your users to see and understand your content without having the ability to see. Especially with the compatibility of its code and screen readers.
Améliorer l’accessibilité de mon site, à: What is the purpose of improving the accessibility of my site ?
Mettre le Web et ses services à la dispo: Make the Web and its services available to all individuals, regardless of their hardware or software, their network infrastructure, their mother tongue, their culture, their location, geographic, or their physical or mental skills.
Here is the definition of accessibility. We can often have a reductionist image of accessibility by thinking that it is only adaptations for handicapped people but this term concerns many more people. This is what is transcribed through this definition.
L’accessibilité pourrait être considérée: Accessibility could be seen as a source of opportunity and development by web players.
Améliorer l’accessibilité de votre site: Improving the accessibility of your website will allow you to reach a wider audience, increase traffic and conversions on your site. You should always be aware that between 15% and 20% of the population suffers from a disability.
Ne pas travailler sur l’accessibilité we: Not working on the web accessibility of your site is to deprive yourself of millions of potential visitors. In France, the law of 11 February 2005, “For equal rights and opportunities, participation and citizenship for people with disabilities” requires, in its article 47, “the accessibility of online public communication services for services of the State, local authorities and public establishments which depend on it ”, initially. In other countries this obligation has existed since the 1990s, as is the case with the United States.
L’univers d’Internet ne doit pas être un: The world of the Internet should not be a source of additional exclusion, but as a tool for promoting social inclusion.
L’Europe parle de l’accessibilité numéri: Europe talks of digital accessibility as a civic obligation: a wider dissemination of accessible digital products and services promotes professional integration, social integration and an independent living environment.
Votre profil a été mis à jour: Your profile has been updated successfully
Vous n'avez aucun projet sauvegardé: You don't have any projects saved
Attention, en supprimant votre compte, t: Be careful, by deleting your account, all content will also be deleted. We can still be friends, right ?
Voulez vous vraiment annuler toutes les: Do you really want to cancel every changes ?
Voulez vous vraiment supprimer cet éléme: Do you really want to delete this project ?
Lien CSS à mettre dans la balise <head>: CSS Link to put into the <head> section
Voici le code brut pour votre formulaire: Here is the raw generated code for your form. You can use it anywhere in the <body> section, but don't change it !
Un lien de vérification vous a été envoy: A fresh verification link has been sent to your email address.
Avant de continuer, veuillez valider vot: Before proceeding, please check your email for a verification link.
Si vous n'avez pas reçu d'adresse e-mail: If you did not receive the email

The data obtained in this way is intended to facilitate subsequent navigation on the site, and is also intended to allow various measures of frequentation.
Le refus d’installation d’un cookie peut: Refusal to install a cookie may result in the inability to access certain services. However, the user can configure his computer in the following way to refuse the installation of cookies:
Sous Internet Explorer : onglet outil (p: Under Internet Explorer: tool tab (gear icon in the top right corner) / internet options. Click on Privacy and choose Block all cookies. Validate on Ok.
Sous Firefox : en haut de la fenêtre du: Under Firefox: at the top of the browser window, click on the Firefox button, then go to the Options tab. Click on the Privacy tab. Set the Retention Rules to: use custom settings for history. Finally uncheck it to disable cookies.
Sous Safari : Cliquez en haut à droite d: Under Safari: Click on the menu pictogram (symbolized by a cog) at the top right of the browser. Select Settings. Click on Show Advanced Settings. In the 'Privacy' section, click on Content Settings. In the 'Cookies' section, you can block cookies.
Sous Chrome : Cliquez en haut à droite d: Under Chrome: Click on the menu pictogram (symbolized by three horizontal lines) in the upper right-hand corner of the browser. Select Settings. Click on Show Advanced Settings. In the 'Privacy' section, click on Preferences. In the 'Privacy' tab, you can block cookies.

Comment utiliser Easy to C ?: How to use Easy To C ?
Voici quelques conseils afin de mieux co: Here are a few tips to better understand and use the potential of EasytoC, the tool that will facilitate the integration of your content. The articles below are here to solve any problems you may encounter and to help you discover features you didn't know existed. Simply select one of the sections below to access several detailed and relevant help documents for creators of online forms, menus and tables.
Vous n'avez pas besoin de créer un compt: You do not need to create an account on Easy to C to use our tools. However, we strongly recommend that you do so because it will allow you to save your content, retrieve it later and modify it as you wish. In addition, there is no project limit. Creating an account does not take more than a few minutes: we do not ask for any personal information.
Se créer un compte Easy to C: Create an Easy to C account
Si vous souhaitez vous créer un compte s: If you wish to create an account on Easy to C, here are a few simple steps: you just have to go to the
Vous avez également la possibilité de vo: You also have the possibility to register faster by using the registration via Facebook or Google. If you choose this option, you must allow Easy to C to access certain information in your account. However, you will not be logged in automatically.
Sur cette page, vous avez alors à rempli: On this page, you then have to fill in some information, including your login (account name), which does not have to be your real name or first name. You must also indicate an e-mail address, which is essential for logging in and accessing your account: it is also on this e-mail address that you will receive e-mails from us (only in the case of a password reset). Your password must be entered twice to avoid typing errors. The password you choose must be at least 8 characters long. If you subsequently lose your password, you can reset it by clicking on this link:
Afin de s'assurer que vous respecterez l: In order to ensure that you will respect the General Conditions of Use of the Easy to C site, you can only register after having read and agreed to these rules: the button "I have read and accept the General Conditions of Use of the site" is mandatory. You can consult these conditions on the
Pour faciliter votre inscription, vous a: To make your registration easier, you have the possibility to make the password you have typed visible. This will allow you to avoid typing mistakes (in addition to confirming the password). To see the password you have typed, just click on the Eye icon on the right of the field.
Chaque champ du formulaire est obligatoi: Each field of the form is mandatory: you cannot register without validating these conditions. If it turns out that your account or your use of the site does not comply with the General Conditions of Use of the site, we reserve the right to permanently delete your account and associated data.
Une fois inscrit, vous êtes automatiquem: Once registered, you are automatically redirected to your account. For more information about your account, please refer to the sub-sections
Attention : vous ne pouvez pas avoir la: Warning: you cannot have the same e-mail address as another user. You cannot therefore have several accounts on the same address.
Se connecter à son compte Easy to C: Login to your Easy to C account
Si vous souhaitez vous connecter à votre: If you wish to login to your Easy to C account, go to Login to your Easy to C account
Pour vous connecter, vous aurez besoin d: To log in, you will need the email address you used when you registered, as well as your password. To make your connection easier, you have the possibility to see the password you typed, to avoid typing mistakes, and to check the 'Remember me' box. This will allow the browser to remember your login, so you won't have to log in again each time you use the site.
Vous avez la possibilité de vous connect: You have the ability to sign in faster by using Facebook or Google sign in (only available if you signed up using one of these methods. If you registered manually, you can only access this account by logging in manually, and vice versa.
Pour accéder à votre compte une fois con: To access your account once you have logged in, go to the
Via cette page, vous retrouverez vos dif: Via this page, you will find your various creations, information about your account, as well as various possible actions.
Vous pouvez retrouver les différent proj: You can retrieve the different projects you have saved, access the
La liste des projets sauvegardés se trou: The list of saved projects can be found on the left side of the dashboard. You have the possibility to sort this list by type (Menu, Form, Table), by modification date. You can also search the list via the search bar.
Pour chaque projet, vous pouvez voir son: For each project, you can see its title, description, last modification date and type (Table, Form or Menu).
Sur la droite de chaque projet, vous ave: On the right side of each project, you have three actions available: view, edit and delete.
vous permettra de voir votre projet, l'a: will allow you to see your project, display it as such but also see the code that allows you to generate and copy it. The other possible actions on this project are also present on the Visualization page.
vous permettra de modifier votre projet: will allow you to modify your project with the same interface that you used to create it. The tools are the same so as not to confuse you. On the edit page, you will be able to cancel or save your changes. You will also be able to delete it.
vous permettra de supprimer définitiveme: will allow you to permanently delete your project. A confirmation message will ask you to validate the deletion before doing so. Warning: a deleted folder cannot be restored.
Vous pouvez retrouver les informations d: You can find your account information on your
Toutes les informations concernant votre: All information about your account can be found on the right side of the dashboard. You have the possibility to change this information: e-mail address, password, account name.
Si vous ne souhaitez plus utiliser votre: If you no longer wish to use your account, or for any other reason, you have the option to Delete your account.
Vous devrez valider l'action avant que v: You will have to validate the action before your account is deleted: this will be the only step. Be careful when you make your choice.
Avez-vous fait le bon choix ? Pourrons-n: Did you do the right thing? Can we ever forgive you? All these questions should not be asked: don't leave us, we will miss you.
Tous les contenus associés à votre compt: All content associated with your account will be deleted and cannot be restored.
Une fois inscrit et connecté sur Easy To: Once registered and connected to Easy To C, you will be able to have a global view of all your projects saved on the dashboard accessible from your Account page.
En tant que nouveau venu vous n'aurez bi: As a newcomer you won't have any plans. To start a project, simply click on the 'Start Project' button and choose the nature of your project (menu, table, form).
Pour sauvegarder votre projet vous devre: To save your project you will need to click on the "Save my project" button available below the work area.
Votre projet sera alors sauvegardé et di: Your project will then be saved and available at any time via the dashboard, so you can work on it later.
Si vous n'êtes pas satisfait de votre ré: If you are not satisfied with your achievement or if you simply want to modify all or part of it, you can modify it by going to your dashboard. You will find your projects with the option
to the right of the project summary.
Une fois votre projet terminé, vous pouv: Once your project is complete, you can use the generated code for external purposes. You only have to copy/paste the code (don't forget the first link tag to get the same graphical style) to use it
Si vous voulez importer vos données vous: If you want to import your data you must have a file in CSV or JSON format.
Si vous optez pour un fichier CSV il con: If you opt for a CSV file, you will have to fill in an Excel file and export it as a .csv file (the black boxes are for demonstration purposes and do not need to be filled in).
Easy To C vous propose des modèles pour: Easy To C offers templates for each of the three tools - called templates. Download them for free and test them with the Easy To C creation interface!
Sur votre tableau de bord, vous retrouve: On your dashboard, you will find all your saved projects. For each project, several options are available :
Si vous possedez déjà un code personnel: If you already have a personal code that generates a table using raw data, you can work on it using the 'Import data' button at the top left of the interface.
En important votre fichier de données, E: By importing your data file, Easy To C will generate your code, you will then be able to modify it according to your wishes.
Parce que nous n'avons pas toujours la b: Because we don't always have the right idea at the right time, or because you have suffered too long from the white page syndrome, Easy to C proposes to work on the basis of an example of
En cliquant sur le bouton 'Générer un ex: By clicking on the 'Generate an example' button, a
sera généré automatiquement sur l'espace: will be automatically generated on the Easy To C workspace.
Vous pourrez ainsi vous faire une idée s: This will give you an idea of the possibilities offered by the
Easy To C et les nombreuses possibilités: Easy To C and the many customization possibilities it offers and test them.
En créant votre tableau, vous aurez la p: When creating your table, you will be able to modify at your leisure its title, number of rows, columns and their contents as well as its legend. But that's not all, Easy To C also offers you the possibility to add vertical and/or horizontal headers and also a table footer. You will be able to move a box, merge some of them, move or delete a row/column. You have no more excuses to get started !
Nous vous rappelons que la sauvegarde d': We remind you that saving a project is only available to our registered users. See
Si vous possedez déjà un code personnel: If you already have a personal code that generates a table using raw data (JSON files, CSV files), you can work on it using the 'Import data' button at the top left of the interface.
Parce que nous n'avons pas toujours la b: Because we don't always have the right idea at the right time, or you have suffered too long from the white page syndrome, Easy to C offers you to work on the basis of a sample menu.
En cliquant sur le bouton \"Générer un e: By clicking on the button "Generate an example", a menu will be automatically generated on the Easy To C workspace.
Vous pourrez ainsi vous faire une idée s: This will give you an idea of the possibilities offered by the MenuEasy To C menu generator and the many customization options it offers, and you can test them out.
En créant votre menu, vous aurez la poss: When creating your menu, you will be able to modify its title and the logo of your menu at your leisure.
Easy To C vous propose également la poss: Easy To C also offers you the possibility to add a heading with a sub-menu, to add a simple link or a sub-menu link while customizing their titles.
Vous pourrez déplacer chaque rubrique de: You will be able to move each item from left to right and each sub-menu from bottom to top. There's no excuse to get started !
Si vous possedez déjà un code personnel: If you already have a personal code that generates a form using raw data (JSON files, CSV files), you can work on it using the 'Import data' button at the top left of the interface.
Parce que nous n'avons pas toujours la b: Because we don't always have the right idea at the right time, or because you have suffered too long from the white page syndrome, Easy to C offers you to work on the basis of a sample form.
En cliquant sur le bouton 'Générer un ex: By clicking on the button 'Generate an example', a form will be automatically generated on the workspace of Easy To C presenting all the functionalities proposed. You will thus be able to get an idea of the possibilities offered by the Easy To C form generator and the numerous customization possibilities it offers and thus test them.
En important votre fichier de données, E: By importing your data file, Easy To C will generate your code, you will then be able to modify your form according to your wishes.
En créant votre formulaire vous aurez la: By creating your form you will be able to modify at your leisure its title, its data processing link and its method (GET or POST). A reset button allows you to reset the workspace. You have 2 levels of personalization :
Ajouter une nouvelle section à votre for: Add a new section to your form.
Add a title to your form.
Ajoute un lien hypertexte à votre formul: Add a hyperlink to your form.
Ajoute une liste numérotée au formulaire: Adds a numbered list to the form.
Ajoute une liste sous forme de puces au: Adds a bulleted list to the form.
Ajoute une question avec un champs de te: Adds a question with a short text field. You can specify the type of answer expected (Text, Number, Email or Date).
Adds a question with a long text field.
Ajoute un choix en liste d'options. Vous: Adds a choice to the list of options. You can add options and specify multiple choices or a required response per option.
Ainsi que les options d'actions sur les: As well as action options on items and text formatting options.
Vous n'avez plus aucune excuse pour vous: You no longer have any excuse to get into it !
Fin de la table des matières, retour au: End of table of contents, back to content
